So the Saitou we think we've seen is not Saitou at all. Well that 
certainly explains why the portrait and group photos look similar yet so 
different.  Guess I'll be making some notations to the website asap on 
that.

Does anyone but me have this impression of him kicking back in the 
afterlife and watching with quite a bit of amusement as so many people 
assume that the charcoal portrait is him? You just know he's smirking 
and calling out "Ahous!"

And does anyone else but me picture dear Tokio tossing went underwear 
in  Saitou's face and saying , "If you want them so perfectly white and 
wrinkleless then wash them yourself, buster!"

-- 
Barbara Sheridan	

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
